nodes.text: The Crystalview Cantina was an open-air cantina in the hidden township of Aurilia on the planet Dathomir. Denizens of Aurilia were often seen spending their time in the cantina. It also provided enough space for live entertainment.

Aurilia's Crystalview Cantina was added to the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies with Chapter 7 in November 2007, along with the rest of the new township of Aurilia. It offers players of the entertainer profession a place to perform their music and dances in Aurilia.
The cantina's name is revealed by signs in front of the cantina area.
